name: AP_CLAIM_PROC
description:
This table summarizes data for AP Claims service lines, with each service line given one row.





To link this tableï¿½s service line information back to a claim header, join this table to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS on the TX_ID column. If you need to report on claim service lines specific to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), join this table instead to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR on the TX_ID column. If you care about neither distinguishing CSR-related service lines nor the ordering of service lines on a claim, you can join back to the claim header on this table's CLAIM_ID column.

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the AP Claim procedure transaction.

columns.name: PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the procedure associated with the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: SVC_FROM_DATE
columns.description: The beginning service date for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: SVC_TO_DATE
columns.description: The ending service date for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: MODIFIERS
columns.description: A list of modifiers used with the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The amount billed for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The allowed amount calculated for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: NET_PAYABLE
columns.description: The net payable amount for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the place of service type of the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.
entries: Intermediate Care Facility/ Individuals with Intellectual Disabilities
Telehealth - Provided Other than in Patient's Home

columns.name: OVERRIDE_ALLD_AMT
columns.description: The override allowed amount for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: OVERRIDE_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value associated with the reason for the override.

columns.name: TYPE_OF_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the type of service associated with the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.
entries: Ambulatory Surgical Center (Facility usage for Surgical Services)
Lump Sum Purchase of DME, Prostethics, Orthotics
Surgical Dressings or Other Medical Supplies

columns.name: PRIM_INS_AMOUNT
columns.description: For non-primary claims (e.g. secondary), the sum of the insurance amounts paid by previous payors.

columns.name: PRIM_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: For non-primary claims (e.g. secondary), the sum of all patient portion amounts specified by previous payors.

columns.name: PROC_INSURANCE_AMT
columns.description: The calculated insurance amount for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: NET_INSURANCE_AMT
columns.description: The net insurance amount for this procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: WITHHOLD_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value representing the method of withholding an amount for this procedure.

columns.name: WITHHOLD_RATE
columns.description: The rate to be withheld for this procedure.

columns.name: COMP_WITHHOLDING
columns.description: The computed withholding amount for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: COMP_ADJUSTMENT
columns.description: The computed adjustment amount for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ACTUAL_ADJUSTMENT
columns.description: The actual adjustment taken for this procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJUST_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The category value of the reason for the adjustment to this procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_BILLED_AMT
columns.description: The adjusted billed amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_ALLOWED_AMT
columns.description: The adjusted allowed amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_PAT_PORTION
columns.description: The adjusted patient portion after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_INS_AMT
columns.description: The adjusted insurance amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_ADJUSTMENT
columns.description: The adjusted adjustment amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_NET_INS
columns.description: The adjusted net insurance amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_WITHHOLDING
columns.description: The adjusted withholding amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: ADJ_NET_PAYABLE
columns.description: The adjusted net payable amount after refund for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: PAT_PORTION
columns.description: The patient portion for the procedure on the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: REVENUE_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the revenue code/procedure associated with the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: QUANTITY
columns.description: The quantity (number of units, procedures, etc.) billed on this service line.

columns.name: REFUND_REVERSAL_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the reversal procedure transaction for refund.

columns.name: REFUND_ADJT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the adjustment procedure transaction for refund.

columns.name: EOB_COMMENT
columns.description: The claim code (explanation of benefit code) comment on the procedure.

columns.name: UC_VALUE
columns.description: The usual and customary amount for the procedure.

columns.name: CONTRACT_ALLOWED
columns.description: The contractual allowed amount for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_DISALW_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the reason for overriding the disallowed amount on the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_DISALW_AMT
columns.description: The override disallowed amount for the procedure.

columns.name: DISALW_AMT
columns.description: The disallowed amount for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_NOT_CVD
columns.description: The override not covered amount for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: The override deductible amount for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_COINS
columns.description: The override coinsurance amount for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_COPAY
columns.description: The override copay amount for the procedure.

columns.name: NON_CVD_AMT
columns.description: The non-covered amount for the procedure.

columns.name: DEDUCTIBLE
columns.description: The deductible amount for the procedure.

columns.name: COPAYMENT
columns.description: The copayment amount for the procedure.

columns.name: COINSURANCE
columns.description: The coinsurance amount for the procedure.

columns.name: PATIENT_TOT
columns.description: The total patient portion for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_PAT_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the reason for overriding the patient portion on the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_PAT_PORT
columns.description: The override patient portion amount for the procedure.

columns.name: PRICING_ATTR_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the pricing attribute for the procedure (used in conjunction with the vendor contract).

columns.name: PENALTY_BEF_BEN
columns.description: The before benefits provider penalty amount for the procedure.

columns.name: PENALTY_AFT_BEN
columns.description: The after benefits provider penalty amount for the procedure.

columns.name: EXCEEDED_BEN_AMT
columns.description: The amount on the procedure that exceeds benefits.

columns.name: COB_SAVING_AMT
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) savings amount for the procedure.

columns.name: PAT_OUT_OF_POCKET
columns.description: The total patient out-of-pocket amount for the procedure.

columns.name: SUB_PEN_ADJ_STR
columns.description: The submission penalty adjudication string for the procedure.

columns.name: ALLOWED_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The allowed code for the procedure (e.g., claim denied, procedure denied, contracted rate payment).
entries: Payment as per Appeals Review Committee
Payment as per Duality Review Committee

columns.name: WITHHOLDING
columns.description: The withholding amount for the procedure.

columns.name: TX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID that indicates the type of procedure. Only AP claim types should appear in this table (e.g. AP claim, AP claim refund, AP claim DRG).

columns.name: DRG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of Diagnosis Related Group (DRG) code for the procedure.

columns.name: DRG_ID_DRG_NAME
columns.description: The name of the Diagnoses Related Group name.

columns.name: PAT_PORT_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the type of patient payment for the procedure (e.g., coinsurance, copay, not covered).

columns.name: DISCOUNT
columns.description: The discount amount for the procedure.

columns.name: SECONDARY_DISC_AMT
columns.description: The amount of additional discount on a secondary claim.

columns.name: PRIMARY_FACTORS
columns.description: The amount on a non-primary (e.g. secondary) claim that was paid/handled by the primary payor.

columns.name: SEC_PROV_RESP
columns.description: The secondary denied amount if the service is denied to provider responsibility.

columns.name: UNCVRD_EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the denial EOB code if the claim is denied and the billed amount is routed to Patient Not Covered.

columns.name: DISC_EOB_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the denial claim code used when the claim is denied and the discount amount is adjudicated as the billed amount.

columns.name: PRICE_USING_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the method used to price the service (e.g. Revenue code, HCPCS code, DRG code). This is set only for UB claims.

columns.name: STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID of the procedure's status.

columns.name: CVG_ID
columns.description: The ID of the coverage used to pay the procedure on the claim.

columns.name: APC_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) code that mapped to the procedure.

columns.name: APC_PRICE
columns.description: The Ambulatory Payment Classification (APC) price for the procedure.

columns.name: OVRD_EXCD_BEN_AMT
columns.description: The override exceeded benefit amount for the procedure.

columns.name: COB_SAVINGS_PAYOUT
columns.description: The Coordination of Benefits (COB) savings member payout.

columns.name: PAT_PAY_ADJ_STR
columns.description: The patient payment adjudication string.

columns.name: ALWD_AMT_ADJ_STR
columns.description: The allowed amount adjudication string.

columns.name: CMG_MATCHED_ID
columns.description: Stores the matched component group for referral bed days for this service.

columns.name: CMG_MATCHED_ID_COMPONENT_GRP_NAME
columns.description: The name of the component group

columns.name: NPR_BDTABLE_LINE
columns.description: The line number of the bed days mapping table in the Tapestry Profile (I NPR 41040) on which the procedure matched.

columns.name: REL_WT_BED_DAY
columns.description: Relative weight of the bed day type mapped to this service.

columns.name: RFL_MATCHED_ID
columns.description: Referral matched for service.

columns.name: TOD_MATCHED_ID
columns.description: Bed day type matched for service.

columns.name: TOD_MATCHED_ID_BED_DAY_TYPE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the bed day type record (i.e. ICU or non-authorized.)

columns.name: WEIGHT_BED_DAYS
columns.description: Weight of bed days for service.

columns.name: UBC_REVENUE_CODE_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the revenue code/procedure associated with the accounts payable claim record.

columns.name: UBC_REVENUE_CODE_ID_REVENUE_CODE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the revenue code.

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: The claim to which this service associated.  For most claim services, this column is equivalent to joining this table's TX_ID column to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS.TX_ID and retrieving AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS.CLAIM_ID.  For services related to Cost Sharing Reduction (CSR), this column is equivalent to joining this table's TX_ID column to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR.TX_ID and retrieving AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR.CLAIM_ID.  To retrieve the ordering of service lines on a claim, join to AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS or AP_CLAIM_PROC_IDS_CSR as appropriate and retrieve the LINE column.

columns.name: PEN_AFT_BEN_COMPUTED
columns.description: The after benefits provider penalty amount for the procedure, as computed by the system.

columns.name: PEN_AFT_BEN_OVRIDE
columns.description: The after benefits provider penalty amount for the procedure, as overridden by the user.

columns.name: PEN_AFT_BEN_OVRIDE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: The reason given for setting the provider penalty after benefits override, if any. This should be translated using ZC_PEN_AFT_BEN_OVRIDE_RSN.

columns.name: POS_TYPE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description: Source of the procedure's Place of Service type

columns.name: OVERRIDE_UC_VALUE
columns.description: The amount that overrides the usual and customary amount for the procedure.
